install.name: GCalendar Next Event
install.author: G4J Project
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: This module shows the next event from a google calendar, displayed via provided html.

param.name: style_parameters
param.label: Style Parameters
param.description: Key value pairs to pass into the style.

param.name: offset
param.label: Event Order Offset
param.description: Show the event X number of events after the immediate next event

param.name: output
param.label: Event output
param.description: Here you can customize the appearance of the event.
param.content:
{y<}{yn}
{yl}{y>}{o<}{on}
{ol}{o>}{w<}{wn}
{wl}{w>}{d<}{dn}
{dl}{d>}{h<}{hn}
{hl}{h>}{m<}{mn}
{ml}{m>}{s<}{sn}
{sl}{s>}
{desc}
param.description: Here you can modify the event output. This will depend on the style you chose.

param.name: output_now
param.label: Event Now output
param.description: Here you can customize the appearance of an event that is happening right now.
param.content: Join us at [map]

param.name: no_event
param.label: No Event Text
param.description: Customize the output when there are no events found.

param.name: find
param.label: Event Search
param.description: Find events whose title/description contain this string. Standard Google search expressions are allowed (e.g. find only me, -dont_find_me, find this that)

param.name: title_filter
param.label: Event Title Filter
param.description: Show only events with titles that match this regular expression

param.name: start_date
param.label: Start Date
param.description: Limit to events that have only started since this date (can be relative)

param.name: end_date
param.label: End Date
param.description: Limit to events that will start before date (can be relative)

param.name: max_events
param.label: Max Events
param.description: Download only the next specified number of events.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module.

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached in sec.
